profile.title: $t(common.template) description
profile.help: This description will be visible to anyone browsing through the $t(common.templates). However, it is not part of the actual {{entityTypeName}} content.

spaceTemplates.name: $t(common.enums.templateType.COLLABORATION)
spaceTemplates.title: $t(common.templateLibrary): $t(common.enums.templateType.COLLABORATION_plural)

findByUrl.title: $t(common.subspace) URL
findByUrl.description: Enter the URL of the $t(common.space) or $t(common.subspace) you want to copy as a $t(common.template).
findByUrl.urlRequired: Please paste here the URL of the $t(common.space) you want to copy as a $t(common.template).
findByUrl.noRights: You need $t(common.admin) rights in the $t(common.space) you want to copy as a $t(common.template).
findByUrl.invalidUrl: The url is not recognized as a $t(common.space) URL.

spaceTemplates.recursive: Also include $t(common.subspaces) of the selected $t(common.space) in the $t(common.template)

templateLibrary.loadPlatformTemplates: Or click here to browse through all platform $t(common.templates)
templateLibrary.platformUseDisabled: Please note that you can only use the $t(common.templates) that are selected for this $t(common.community) (see above). If you would like to use any of the $t(common.templates) below, please ask the $t(common.admin) or the $t(common.lead) of the $t(common.space) to add these in the $t(common.template) section of the $t(common.space) Settings.
templateLibrary.disabledTemplateInfo: Please note that you can only use the $t(common.templates) that are selected for this $t(common.community), which this is not. If you would like to use this $t(common.template), please ask the $t(common.admin) or the $t(common.lead) of the $t(common.space) to add it in the $t(common.template) section of the $t(common.space) $t(common.settings).

confirmClose.title: Discard $t(common.template)
confirmClose.description: Are you sure you want to close this $t(common.template)? Unsaved changes will be lost.

plansTable.title: Kies een abonnement
plansTable.subtitle: To create a safe environment to train your $t(common.virtualContributor), you first need to create a $t(common.space). Choose a plan for this $t(common.space) below.
plansTable.seeMore: Klik hier voor de volledige beschrijving van elk abonnement

buttonCaptions.startTrial: Start je gratis proefperiode van 30 dagen

plans.name: SPACE_LICENSE_FREE
plans.disclaimer: Free $t(common.spaces) are limited to 1 $t(common.space) per user
plans.disabledDisclaimer: Each user can have 1 free $t(common.space). It seems like you’ve already used yours!

freeTrial.title: Gratis proefperiode
freeTrial.content:
Try our free 30-day trial of the Plus license to unlock exciting features like creating $t(common.virtualContributors) and multi-user $t(common.whiteboard) editing. No payment details required! After the trial, choose between upgrading to Plus or continuing with the Free license.

Questions? [Contact our support team anytime](https://welcome.alkem.io/contact).

getStarted.title: Ga direct aan de slag!
getStarted.content: Since we don’t want to hold you up any longer, you receive a 30-day free trial. After these 30 days we will ask you to set up your $t(common.account) details in order to continue using your $t(common.space). If you have any questions, feel free to contact support here.
